name: Inspector - 生化战警
description:
《Inspector》is a hot-blooded cross-border game. Officer Li Xiaoxiong received a secret mission from his superior, Director Lewis, and sent him to destroy the strongholds of gangster drug lords. Along the way, there are secret bases, bushes, valleys and even rooms for human experiments. Studying the organization of "Resurrection Plan" can create very powerful corpse fighters. For officer Li Xiaoxiong, who has strong physique and martial arts skills, it is a considerable challenge. When the wounded Li Xiaoxiong finally finished the task of smashing the nest, two tough men's manoeuvres were very similar to those of Director Lewis. Li Xiaoxiong became suspicious...

Game features:

* Brilliant and vivid pictures.

* Beautiful BGM.

* Super shock.

* Fist to meat fights.

* Unique weapon bloody killing effect.

* Rich game plots.
